text: Hi :wave: <@U058ZPH175H>  thank you so much for the answer! it was very helpful :slightly_smiling_face:
Curious if anyone has any tips we are trying to create Workflows via API we keep getting errors when adding marketing emails to the flow where we can't edit the workflow thats created in the GUI.

Hello. I have HubSpot set up connected to Shopify. HubSpot reports visits to Shopify pages to a table that I can query in Snowflake. I'm trying to tie those visits to individual contacts in HubSpot using a SQL query, but haven't been able to figure our how. Can anyone help me out?
I understand that this can only be done for contacts that have filled out a form or have existing contact records.

Hi , guys is there any way to create custom event programatically ?

Because i have to send custom behavioural data to that event
Im trying to support multiple currencies in one deal, is there a HubSpot limitation on that or should it in theory be possible?

Would you mind expanding on what you mean when you say, “support”? I think it’s largely dependent on what you want and what you’re willing to do. HubSpot supports multiple currencies, but to the best of my knowledge (definitely double check this) - you can’t track multiple currencies on a single record using native functionality.

If you had a coded action running to grab current exchange rates from one of the numerous APIs that provide that data, you could definitely, in theory, keep track of say…a converted deal amount displayed in USD, Euro, and GBP on separate properties. Or even concatenated within a text field if that floats your boat.
Is there a way to send a SALES email (one to one) from a custom workflow action?
Not transactional (users would need the 600 p/m addon)
Not marketing (must work for non marketing contacts)
Trying to make something VERY cool
